title: QBIC of SEM for diffusion processes from discrete observations
abstract:
We deal with a model selection problem for structural equation modeling (SEM)
with latent variables for diffusion processes. Based on the asymptotic
expansion of the marginal quasi-log likelihood, we propose two types of
quasi-Bayesian information criteria of the SEM. It is shown that the
information criteria have model selection consistency. Furthermore, we examine
the finite-sample performance of the proposed information criteria by numerical
experiments.
